local_intent: Perform the transfer push of the T-block leftward (yaw 180°, distance 0.2 m) and verify it reaches the target outline.
assumptions: Block is already within reachable vicinity; minor lateral alignment suffices before push.
coherence_with_global: Respects perceive→align→act→verify: confirms visibility, sets yaw=180, aligns to block with 0.005 tolerance, pushes 0.2 at 180°, then checks IsAt(goal_T). Matches GLOBAL_BT transfer step semantics.
